charges.charge_description: 8:1326(a), (b)(2): ILLEGAL ALIEN FOUND IN THE UNITED STATES FOLLOWING DEPORTATION AND AGGRAVATED FELONY CONVICTION (1)

charges.charge_disposition: CT 1: Dft comm to the cust of BOP for a term of 15 mos &; shall serve a supv rel term of 3 yrs; dft shall comply w/rules &; reg of the PO &; GO 318; dft shall comply w/rules &; reg of the INS; all fines are waived, including the costs of imprisonment &; supv, as it is found tht the dft does not hv the ability to pay. Crt ords tht dft pay a $100.00 s/a to the US. The crt ecommends tht the dft be placed in a California facility. The crt advised the dft of his right to appeal (1)
